meanings.definition: To pack or transport (goods) in containers.
meanings.sent1: The workers containerized the products for shipment.
meanings.sent2: She containerized the leftovers in plastic boxes.
meanings.sent3: The kids containerized their toys in colorful bins.
meanings.sent4: He containerized his emotions, keeping them hidden from others.
meanings.sent5: The chef containerized the ingredients neatly for easy access.

meanings.definition: To adapt (software) for use in a containerized environment.
meanings.sent1: The IT team containerized the application for cloud deployment.
meanings.sent2: Developers containerized the code to streamline deployment processes.
meanings.sent3: The software engineer containerized the program, making it more portable.
meanings.sent4: She containerized the data, ensuring seamless integration with other systems.
meanings.sent5: The company containerized the software, improving scalability and efficiency.
